channel.title: SoulSplit Source+Client
channel.description:
Okay so the computer that I've been coding on is in the shop right now for about 10 days........ I couldn't get a copy of my source because it just kinda randomly stoppedlol..., the files are safe, but I'd like to progress while I wait for my good computer to be fixed.
I've searched numerous places but I can't find it. The download I'm looking for is titled "Soulsplit Source+Client" (or something like that.. very close at least)... the cache was titled "soulsplit1"... I got it on mediafire. I can't find a working link at all :\
Help me pleeaseeee

item.title: SoulSplit Source+Client
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Theirs a RSPS based on SS called evulous I think (or something similar) which is really nice, check it out in the download section. It’ll be in one of the top pages if not on the first page.

Read full topic

item.title: SoulSplit Source+Client
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

The one that has been released is missing tons of stuff. I’ve seen it released on R-S recently, though, if you’re up to the challenge of fixing everything.

Read full topic
